name: Jira Toolkit v.1.01
description: Tools for working with Jira - Adapted for Langflow 1.0.19 (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

code.value:
from typing import Union, Optional
from langchain_community.utilities.jira import JiraAPIWrapper
from langchain_community.agent_toolkits.jira.toolkit import JiraToolkit
from langchain.agents import AgentType, initialize_agent
from axiestudio.base.langchain_utilities.model import LCToolComponent
from axiestudio.inputs import SecretStrInput, MessageTextInput, DictInput, BoolInput
from axiestudio.schema import Data
from axiestudio.field_typing import Tool, BaseTool
from langchain.tools import StructuredTool
from pydantic import BaseModel, Field
from axiestudio.io import Output, BoolInput


class JiraToolComponent(LCToolComponent):
    display_name: str = "Jira Tool v.1"
    description: str = "Tools for working with Jira - Adapted for Langflow 1.0.19"
    name = "JiraTool"
    beta = True
    documentation: str = "https://python.langchain.com/v0.2/docs/integrations/tools/jira/"
    icon = "langchain_utilities"

    inputs = [
        MessageTextInput(
            name="jira_username", 
            display_name="Atlassian Account's Email", 
            required=True,
            advanced=False,
            info="info",
        ),
        SecretStrInput(
            name="jira_api_token",
            display_name="Atlassian Account's API Token",
            required=True,
            advanced=False,
            info="info",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="jira_instance_url",
            display_name="Jira Instance URL",
            required=True,
            advanced=False,
            info="info",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="jira_cloud",
            display_name="Jira Cloud",
            value="True",
            required=True,
            advanced=True,
            info="info",
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(name="api_run_model", display_name="Data", method="run_model"),
        Output(name="api_build_tool", display_name="Tool", method="build_tool"),
    ]

    def JiraAPIWrapper(self) -> JiraAPIWrapper:
        jira_username = self.get_input("jira_username").value
        jira_api_token = self.get_input("jira_api_token").value
        jira_instance_url = self.get_input("jira_instance_url").value
        jira_cloud = (self.get_input("jira_cloud").value)
        
        return JiraAPIWrapper(
            jira_api_token=jira_api_token,
            jira_instance_url=jira_instance_url,
            jira_cloud=jira_cloud,
            jira_username=jira_username
        )
    
    def build_tool(self) -> Tool:
        jira_username = self.get_input("jira_username").value
        jira_api_token = self.get_input("jira_api_token").value
        jira_instance_url = self.get_input("jira_instance_url").value
        jira_cloud = (self.get_input("jira_cloud").value)

        jira = JiraAPIWrapper(jira_api_token=jira_api_token, jira_instance_url=jira_instance_url, jira_cloud=jira_cloud, jira_username=jira_username)
        toolkit = JiraToolkit.from_jira_api_wrapper(jira)
        
        for tool in toolkit.tools:
            tool.name = tool.name.replace(" ", "_")
        
        return toolkit.tools

from typing import Union, Optional
from langchain_community.utilities.jira import JiraAPIWrapper
from langchain_community.agent_toolkits.jira.toolkit import JiraToolkit
from langchain.agents import AgentType, initialize_agent
from axiestudio.base.langchain_utilities.model import LCToolComponent
from axiestudio.inputs import SecretStrInput, MessageTextInput, DictInput, BoolInput
from axiestudio.schema import Data
from axiestudio.field_typing import Tool, BaseTool
from langchain.tools import StructuredTool
from pydantic import BaseModel, Field
from axiestudio.io import Output, BoolInput


class JiraToolComponent(LCToolComponent):
    display_name: str = "Jira Tool v.1"
    description: str = "Tools for working with Jira - Adapted for Langflow 1.0.19"
    name = "JiraTool"
    beta = True
    documentation: str = "https://python.langchain.com/v0.2/docs/integrations/tools/jira/"
    icon = "langchain_utilities"

    inputs = [
        MessageTextInput(
            name="jira_username", 
            display_name="Atlassian Account's Email", 
            required=True,
            advanced=False,
            info="info",
        ),
        SecretStrInput(
            name="jira_api_token",
            display_name="Atlassian Account's API Token",
            required=True,
            advanced=False,
            info="info",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="jira_instance_url",
            display_name="Jira Instance URL",
            required=True,
            advanced=False,
            info="info",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="jira_cloud",
            display_name="Jira Cloud",
            value="True",
            required=True,
            advanced=True,
            info="info",
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(name="api_run_model", display_name="Data", method="run_model"),
        Output(name="api_build_tool", display_name="Tool", method="build_tool"),
    ]

    def JiraAPIWrapper(self) -> JiraAPIWrapper:
        jira_username = self.get_input("jira_username").value
        jira_api_token = self.get_input("jira_api_token").value
        jira_instance_url = self.get_input("jira_instance_url").value
        jira_cloud = (self.get_input("jira_cloud").value)
        
        return JiraAPIWrapper(
            jira_api_token=jira_api_token,
            jira_instance_url=jira_instance_url,
            jira_cloud=jira_cloud,
            jira_username=jira_username
        )
    
    def build_tool(self) -> Tool:
        jira_username = self.get_input("jira_username").value
        jira_api_token = self.get_input("jira_api_token").value
        jira_instance_url = self.get_input("jira_instance_url").value
        jira_cloud = (self.get_input("jira_cloud").value)

        jira = JiraAPIWrapper(jira_api_token=jira_api_token, jira_instance_url=jira_instance_url, jira_cloud=jira_cloud, jira_username=jira_username)
        toolkit = JiraToolkit.from_jira_api_wrapper(jira)
        
        for tool in toolkit.tools:
            tool.name = tool.name.replace(" ", "_")
        
        return toolkit.tools
